description: Hyperion is a fictional character that appears in publications published by Marvel Comics. The character debuted in The Avengers #69 (Oct. 1969), with six notable versions to date - two supervillains belonging to the team Squadron Sinister (from Earth-616) and another villain and two heroes from alternate universes, and a zombified clone.
name: Hyperion (Earth-712)
powers: regenerative healing factor via cosmic energy manipulation
